statement:
Given a Noetherian ring $A$, an $A$-module $M$, and an ideal $I$ inside
the radical of $A$, we have that $M$ is separated with respect to the
$I$-adic topology.

Furthermore, if $A$ is also an integral domain and $J\subset A$ is a
proper ideal, we have $$\begin{aligned}
\bigcap_{n>0}J^n=(0)\end{aligned}$$
